assistant.desc: 通用助手机器人。对于需要最新信息的查询，它可以从网络访问实时数据以提供更准确的答案。

web-search.desc: 支持网络的助手机器人，通过搜索互联网来丰富其回答。特别擅长处理关于最新信息或具体事实的查询。由 GPT 4o Mini 驱动。

claude-3.5-sonnet.desc: Anthropic 最强大的模型。擅长复杂任务如编码、写作、分析和视觉处理。上下文窗口已被缩短以优化速度和成本。对于需要更长上下文的消息，请尝试 Claude-3.5-Sonnet-200k。积分可能会发生变化。

gpt-4o.desc: OpenAI 最强大的模型。在定量问题（数学和物理）、创意写作以及许多其他挑战性任务中比 GPT-3.5 更强。由 GPT-4o 提供支持。上下文窗口已缩短，以优化速度和成本。对于更长的上下文消息，请尝试 GPT-4o-128k。

grok-2.desc: Grok 2 is xAI's latest and most intelligent language model. It features state-of-the-art capabilities in coding, reasoning, and answering questions. It excels at handling complex and multi-step tasks. Grok 2 does not have access to real-time information from X or the internet as part of its integration with Poe.

deepseek-v3-fw.desc: DeepSeek-V3 is an open-source Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) language model; able to perform well on competitive benchmarks with cost-effective training & inference. All data submitted to this bot is governed by the Poe privacy policy and is sent to Fireworks, a US-based company.

llama-3-70b-groq.owned_by: This bot is powered by Groq.
llama-3-70b-groq.desc: Llama 3 70b powered by the Groq LPU™ Inference Engine

gemini-1.5-pro.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-pro.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-pro-002. The multi-modal model from Google's Gemini family that balances model performance and speed. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. Ideal for uploading small video files under 20 seconds. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For Longer context messages, please try Gemini-1.5-Pro-128k and Gemini-1.5-Pro-2M. The compute points value is subject to change.

claude-3.5-haiku.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-3.5-haiku.desc: The latest generation of Anthropic's fastest model. Claude 3.5 Haiku has fast speeds and improved instruction following. The context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, please try Claude-3.5-Haiku-200k. The compute points value is subject to change.

o1.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
o1.desc: OpenAI's o1 is designed to reason before it responds and provides world-class capabilities on complex tasks (e.g. science, coding, and math). Improving upon o1-preview and with higher reasoning effort, it is also capable of reasoning through images and supports 200k tokens of input context. By default, uses reasoning_effort of "medium;" ability to customize reasoning effort per message coming soon.

mistral-medium.owned_by: This bot is powered by Mistral.
mistral-medium.desc: Mistral AI's medium-sized model. Supports a context window of 32k tokens (around 24,000 words) and is stronger than Mixtral-8x7b and Mistral-7b on benchmarks across the board.

chatgpt-4o-latest.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
chatgpt-4o-latest.desc: OpenAI's most powerful model. Dynamic model continuously updated to the current version of GPT-4o in ChatGPT. Stronger than GPT-3.5 in quantitative questions (math and physics), creative writing, and many other challenging tasks. Powered by chatgpt-4o-latest. Supports context window of 128k tokens.

o3-mini.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
o3-mini.desc: o3-mini is OpenAI's most recent reasoning model, providing high intelligence on a variety of tasks and domains, including science, math, and coding. For higher reasoning effort, use www.poe.com/o3-mini-high -- this bot uses "medium" reasoning effort and supports 200k tokens of input context and 100k tokens of output context.

o3-mini-high.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
o3-mini-high.desc: o3-mini-high is OpenAI's most recent reasoning model with reasoning_effort set to high, providing frontier intelligence on most tasks. Like other models in the o-series, it is designed to excel at science, math, and coding tasks. Supports 200k tokens of input context and 100k tokens of output context.

o1-mini.desc: 这个OpenAI模型是o1的更快、更便宜的版本，特别擅长编码、数学和科学应用，适用于不需要广泛通用知识的场景。它支持128k tokens的上下文。

deepseek-v3-t.desc: Deepseek-v3 – the new top open-source LLM. Achieves state-of-the-art performance in tasks such as coding, mathematics, and reasoning. All data you submit to this bot is governed by the Poe privacy policy and is only sent to Together, a US-based company.

gemini-2.0-flash.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-2.0-flash.desc: Gemini 2.0 Flash builds on the success of 1.5 Flash, Google's most popular model yet for developers, with enhanced performance at similarly fast response times. Notably, 2.0 Flash even outperforms 1.5 Pro on key benchmarks, at twice the speed. Please note that this model is considered experimental, and thus has low rate limits, so users may experience higher-than-normal errors during times of peak usage.

gemini-1.5-flash.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-flash.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-flash-002. This smaller Gemini model is optimized for narrower or high-frequency tasks where the speed of the model’s response time matters the most. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. Ideal for uploading small video files under 20 seconds. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For Longer context messages, please try Gemini-1.5-Flash-128k and Gemini-1.5-Flash-1M. The compute points value is subject to change.

gpt-4o-mini.desc: 由 GPT-4o Mini 提供支持，优化速度和成本的同时，仍然具备强大的功能，适用于一般用途。

llama-3.1-70b.desc: A medium-sized model from Meta's Llama 3.1 family which balances intelligence and speed. This open-source language model excels in multilingual dialogue, outperforming numerous industry benchmarks for both closed and open-source conversational AI systems. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, please try Llama-3.1-70B-FW-128k or Llama-3.1-70B-T-128k. The compute points value is subject to change.

llama-3.1-405b.desc: The pinnacle of Meta's Llama 3.1 family, this open-source language model excels in multilingual dialogue, outperforming numerous industry benchmarks for both closed and open-source conversational AI systems. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, please try Llama-3.1-405B-FW-128k. The compute points value is subject to change.

deepseek-r1.desc: Top open-source reasoning LLM rivaling OpenAI's o1 model; delivers top-tier performance across math, code, and reasoning tasks at a fraction of the cost. All data you provide this bot will not be used in training, and is sent only to Together AI, a US-based company. Supports 164k tokens of input context and 33k tokens of output context.

deepseek-r1-fw.desc: State-of-the-art large reasoning model problem solving, math, and coding performance at a fraction of the cost; explains its chain of thought. All data you provide this bot will not be used in training, and is sent only to Fireworks AI, a US-based company. Supports 164k tokens of input context and 164k tokens of output context.

claude-3-opus.desc: 由 Claude 3 Opus 提供支持，擅长复杂任务，具有 4,000 个 tokens 的上下文窗口。

llama-3.1-8b.desc: The smallest and fastest model from Meta's Llama 3.1 family. This open-source language model excels in multilingual dialogue, outperforming numerous industry benchmarks for both closed and open-source conversational AI systems. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, please try Llama-3.1-70B-FW-128k or Llama-3.1-70B-T-128k. The compute points value is subject to change.

llama-3.1-nemotron.desc: Llama 3.1 Nemotron 70B from Nvidia. Excels in understanding, following instructions, writing and performing coding tasks. Strong reasoning abilities.

f1-preview.desc:
f1 enables developers to access the power of compound AI with the simplicity of prompting. As with declarative programming, users can describe what they want to achieve via prompting, without needing to specify exactly how to accomplish it.
Read more here https://fireworks.ai/blog/fireworks-compound-ai-system-f1

o1-preview.desc: 这是 OpenAI 最新的 o1 模型的早期预览，该模型旨在在回应之前花更多时间进行思考。它能够处理复杂任务并解决比以前的模型在科学、编程和数学方面更难的问题。支持128k个令牌的上下文。

f1-mini-preview.desc:
f1-mini enables developers to access the power of compound AI with the simplicity of prompting. As with declarative programming, users can describe what they want to achieve via prompting, without needing to specify exactly how to accomplish it. It's a smaller, faster variant version of f1.
Read more here https://fireworks.ai/blog/fireworks-compound-ai-system-f1

flux-pro-1.1-ultra.desc: State-of-the-art image generation with four times the resolution of standard FLUX-1.1-pro. Best-in-class prompt adherence and pixel-perfect image detail. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Add "--raw" (no other arguments needed) for an overall less processed, everyday aesthetic. Send  an image to have this model reimagine/regenerate it via FLUX Redux, and use "--strength" (e.g --strength 0.7) to control the impact of the text prompt (1 gives greater influence, 0 means very little).

imagen3.desc: Google DeepMind’s highest quality text-to-image model, capable of generating images with great detail, rich lighting, and few distracting artifacts. To adjust the aspect ratio of your image add --aspect-ratio (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4). To remove visual specific elements, add --no (elements to remove). For simpler prompts, faster results, & lower cost, use @Imagen3-Fast

elevenlabs.desc:
ElevenLabs' leading text-to-speech technology converts your text into natural-sounding speech, using their latest Turbo v2.5 model. Simply send a text prompt, and the bot will generate audio using your choice of available voices. If you link a URL or a PDF, it will do its best to read it aloud to you.

Add --voice "Voice Name" to the end of a message (e.g. "Hello world --voice Eric") to customize the voice used. Add --language and the two-letter, Language ISO-639-1 code to your message if you notice pronunciation errors; table of ISO-639-1 codes here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639_language_codes (e.g. zh for Chinese, es for Spanish, hi for Hindi)

The following voices are supported and recommended for each language:

English -- Sarah, George, River, Matilda, Will, Jessica, Brian, Lily, Monika Sogam
Chinese -- Martin Li, Will, River
Spanish -- David Martin, Will, Efrayn, Alejandro, Sara Martin, Regina Martin
Hindi -- Ranga, Niraj, Liam, Raju, Leo, Manu, Vihana Huja, Kanika, River, Monika Sogam, Muskaan, Saanu, Riya, Devi
Arabic -- Bill, Mo Wiseman, Haytham, George, Mona, Sarah, Sana, Laura
German -- Bill, Otto, Leon Stern, Mila, Emilia, Lea, Leonie
Indonesian -- Jessica, Putra, Mahaputra
Portuguese -- Will, Muhammad, Onildo, Lily, Jessica, Alice
Vietnamese -- Bill, Liam, Trung Caha, Van Phuc, Ca Dao, Trang, Jessica, Alice, Matilda
Filipino -- Roger, Brian, Alice, Matilda
French -- Roger, Louis, Emilie
Swedish -- Will, Chris, Jessica, Charlotte
Turkish -- Cavit Pancar, Sohbet Adami, Belma, Sultan, Mahidevran
Romanian -- Eric, Bill, Brian, Charlotte, Lily
Italian -- Carmelo, Luca, Alice, Lily
Polish -- Robert, Rob, Eric, Pawel, Lily, Alice
Norwegian -- Chris, Charlotte
Czech -- Pawel
Finnish -- Callum, River
Hungarian -- Brian, Sarah
Japanese -- Alice

flux-pro-1.1.desc: State-of-the-art image generation with top-of-the-line prompt following, visual quality, image detail and output diversity. This is the most powerful version of FLUX 1.1, use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Send an image to have this model reimagine/regenerate it via FLUX Redux.

playground-v3.desc: Latest image model from Playground, with industry leading capabilities in understanding complex prompts to generate realistic images, logos, typography, and more. Allows users to specify elements to avoid in the image using the `--no` parameter at the end of the prompt (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --no rain"). Optionally, specify the aspect ratio using the `--aspect` parameter (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --aspect 1:2"). Powered by Playground_v3 from playground.com.

imagen3-fast.desc: Google DeepMind’s highest quality text-to-image model, capable of generating images with great detail, rich lighting, and few distracting artifacts — optimized for short, simple prompts. To adjust the aspect ratio of your image add --aspect-ratio (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4). For more complex prompts, use @Imagen3

ideogram-v2.desc: Latest image model from Ideogram, with industry leading capabilities in generating realistic images, graphic design, typography, and more. Allows users to specify the aspect ratio of the image using the "--aspect" parameter at the end of the prompt (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --aspect 9:16"). Valid aspect ratios are 10:16, 16:10, 9:16, 16:9, 3:2, 2:3, 4:3, 3:4, 1:1. "--style" parameter can be defined to specify the style of image generated(GENERAL, REALISTIC, DESIGN, RENDER_3D, ANIME). Powered by Ideogram.

stablediffusion3.5-l.desc: Stability.ai's StableDiffusion3.5 Large, hosted by @fal, is the Stable Diffusion family's most powerful image generation model both in terms of image quality and prompt adherence. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1).

dall-e-3.desc: OpenAI's most powerful image generation model. Generates high quality images with intricate details based on the user's most recent prompt. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Valid aspect ratios are 1:1, 7:4, & 4:7.

flux-pro.desc: State-of-the-art image generation with top of the line prompt following, visual quality, image detail and output diversity. This is the most powerful version of FLUX.1. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Send an image to have this model reimagine/regenerate it via FLUX Redux.

flux-schnell.desc: Turbo speed image generation with strengths in prompt following, visual quality, image detail and output diversity. This is the fastest version of FLUX.1. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Send an image to have this model reimagine/regenerate it via FLUX Redux.

flux-dev.desc: High-performance image generation with top of the line prompt following, visual quality, image detail and output diversity. This is a more efficient version of FLUX-pro, balancing quality and speed. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1). Send an image to have this model reimagine/regenerate it via FLUX Redux.

llama-3.1-405b-t.desc:
Llama 3.1 405B Instruct from Meta. Supports 128k tokens of context.

The points price is subject to change.

ideogram.desc: Excels at creating high-quality images from text prompts. Its exceptional prompt adherence and state-of-the-art text rendering allow it to handle a wide range of creative requests. Allows users to specify the aspect ratio of the image using the "--aspect" parameter at the end of the prompt (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --aspect 9:16"). Valid aspect ratios are 10:16, 16:10, 9:16, 16:9, 3:2, 2:3, 4:3, 3:4, & 1:1. Powered by Ideogram.

topazlabs.desc: Topaz Labs’ image upscaler is a best-in-class generative AI model to increase overall clarity and the pixel amount of inputted photos — whether they be ones generated by AI image models and from the real world — while preserving the original photo’s contents. It can produce images of as small as ~10MB and as large as 512MB, depending on the size of the input photo. Specify --upscale and a number up to 16 to control the upscaling factor, output_height and/or output_width to specify the number of pixels for each dimension, and add --generated if the input photo is AI-generated. With no parameters specified, it will increase both input photo’s height and width by 2; especially effective on images of human faces.

playgroundupscaler.desc: Enhances the quality and detail of an image while upscaling resolution by 4x with the Playground AI model.

playground-v2.5.desc: Produces visually compelling images, with impressive color vibrancy and contrast, finer human-related details, and multi-aspect ratio support. Allows users to specify elements to avoid in the image using the "--no" parameter at the end of the prompt (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --no rain"). Optionally, specify the aspect ratio using the `--aspect` parameter (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --aspect 1:2"). Powered by Playground_v2.5 from playground.com.

pika-2.0.desc:
Pika's latest and most powerful video generation model (now with scene ingredients). Generate a video using a text prompt or a base image. Select multiple images to use as ingredients for the generated videos. Pass in optional parameters using flags following your prompt. (e.g. "A cat riding a skateboard --no dogs --ingredient_mode creative")

Additional parameters:
--ingredient_mode (creative, precise)
--aspect (e.g. 16:9, 19:13)
--no (negative prompt, e.g. ugly, scary)
--seed (e.g. 12345)

Powered by Pika.

pika-1.0.desc:
Generate a video using a text prompt, an image, or a video. Pass in optional parameters using flags following your prompt. (e.g. "A cat riding a skateboard --aspect 16:9 --framerate 24")

Additional parameters:
--aspect (e.g. 16:9, 19:13)
--framerate (between 8-24)
--motion (motion intensity, between 0-4)
--gs (guidance scale/relevance to text, between 5-25)
--no (negative prompt, e.g. ugly, scary)
--seed (e.g. 12345)

Camera control (use one at a time):
--zoom ("in" or "out")
--pan ("left" or "right")
--tilt ("up" or "down")
--rotate ("cw" or "ccw")

Powered by Pika.

grok-beta.desc: Grok-beta is an early preview of xAI's most intelligent language model. It features state-of-the-art capabilities in coding, reasoning, and answering questions. It excels at handling complex and multi-step tasks. Grok-beta does not have access to real-time information from X or the internet as part of its integration with Poe. For longer context messages, please try Grok-beta-128k. The compute points value is subject to change.

hailuo-ai.desc: Best-in-class text and image to video model by MiniMax.

liveportrait.desc: Animates given portraits with the motion's in the video. Powered by fal.ai

llama-3.1-405b-fw-128k.desc: The Meta Llama 3.1 collection of multilingual large language models (LLMs) is a collection of pretrained and instruction tuned generative models in 8B, 70B and 405B sizes. The Llama 3.1 instruction tuned text only models (8B, 70B, 405B) are optimized for multilingual dialogue use cases and outperform many of the available open source and closed chat models on common industry benchmarks.

llama-3.1-8b-t-128k.desc:
Llama 3.1 8B Instruct from Meta. Supports 128k tokens of context.

The points price is subject to change.

llama-3.1-70b-fw-128k.desc: The Meta Llama 3.1 collection of multilingual large language models (LLMs) is a collection of pretrained and instruction tuned generative models in 8B, 70B and 405B sizes. The Llama 3.1 instruction tuned text only models (8B, 70B, 405B) are optimized for multilingual dialogue use cases and outperform many of the available open source and closed chat models on common industry benchmarks.

llama-3.1-70b-t-128k.desc:
Llama 3.1 70B Instruct from Meta. Supports 128k tokens of context.

The points price is subject to change.

llama-3.1-8b-fw-128k.desc: The Meta Llama 3.1 collection of multilingual large language models (LLMs) is a collection of pretrained and instruction tuned generative models in 8B, 70B and 405B sizes. The Llama 3.1 instruction tuned text only models (8B, 70B, 405B) are optimized for multilingual dialogue use cases and outperform many of the available open source and closed chat models on common industry benchmarks.

gemma-2-27b-t.desc:
Gemma 2 27B Instruct from Google.

The points price is subject to change.

claude-3-sonnet.desc: 由 Claude 3 Sonnet 提供支持，擅长一般任务，具有 4,000 个 tokens 的上下文窗口。

claude-3-haiku.desc: 由 Claude 3 Haiku 提供支持，优化速度和成本，适用于一般用途，具有 4,000 个 tokens 的上下文窗口。

gemini-1.5-flash-128k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-flash-128k.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-flash-002. This smaller Gemini model is optimized for narrower or high-frequency tasks where the speed of the model’s response time matters the most. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. The compute points value is subject to change.

gemini-1.5-pro-128k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-pro-128k.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-pro-002. The multi-modal model from Google's Gemini family that balances model performance and speed. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. The compute points value is subject to change.

gemini-1.5-flash-1m.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-flash-1m.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-flash-002. This smaller Gemini model is optimized for narrower or high-frequency tasks where the speed of the model’s response time matters the most. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. The compute points value is subject to change.

gemini-1.5-pro-2m.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-pro-2m.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-pro-002. The multi-modal model from Google's Gemini family that balances model performance and speed. The model accepts text, image, and video input from the entire conversation and provides text output, with a restriction of one video per message. The compute points value is subject to change.

gpt-4o-mini-128k.desc: 由 GPT-4o Mini 提供支持，具有超大上下文窗口（128,000 个 tokens），在保持性能的同时优化了速度和成本。

gpt-4o-128k.desc: OpenAI 最强大的模型之一，具有超大上下文窗口（128,000 个 tokens）。适用于复杂任务和超长文本处理。

chatgpt-4o-latest-128k.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
chatgpt-4o-latest-128k.desc: OpenAI's most powerful model. Dynamic model continuously updated to the current version of GPT-4o in ChatGPT. Stronger than GPT-3.5 in quantitative questions (math and physics), creative writing, and many other challenging tasks. Powered by chatgpt-4o-latest.

gpt-4-turbo.desc: 由 GPT-4 Turbo 提供支持，具有更高的性能和更大的上下文窗口（4000 个 tokens）。

gemini-1.5-pro-search.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-pro-search.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-pro-002. Gemini 1.5 Pro enhanced by Grounding with Google Search for up-to-date information, and balances model performance and speed. Grounding model currently supports text only.

gemini-1.0-pro.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.0-pro.desc:
The multi-modal model from Google's Gemini family that balances model performance and speed. Exhibits strong generalist capabilities and excels particularly in cross-modal reasoning.

The model accepts text, image, and video input and provides text output. It considers only the images and videos from the latest user message, with a restriction of one video per message.

gemini-1.5-flash-search.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
gemini-1.5-flash-search.desc: Powered by gemini-1.5-flash-002. Gemini 1.5 Flash enhanced by Grounding with Google Search for up-to-date information, and balances model performance and speed. Grounding model currently supports text only.

stablediffusion3-2b.desc: Stable Diffusion v3 Medium - by fal.ai

sd3-medium.desc:
2-billion parameter version of Stable Diffusion 3, which understands complex prompts, supports multiple languages, and has improved spelling over SDXL to generate high-quality images. It is especially good at typography and prompt accuracy.

Stability AI has partnered with Fireworks AI, the fastest and most reliable API platform in the market, to deliver Stable Diffusion 3 and Stable Diffusion 3 Turbo.

llama-3-70b-t.desc:
Llama 3 70B Instruct from Meta.

The points price is subject to change.

llama-3-70b-inst-fw.desc: Meta's Llama-3-70B-Instruct hosted by Fireworks AI.

mixtral8x22b-inst-fw.desc: Mixtral 8x22B Mixture-of-Experts instruct model from Mistral hosted by Fireworks.

command-r.desc: I can search the web for up to date information and respond in over 10 languages!

gemma-2-9b-t.desc:
Gemma 2 9B Instruct from Google.

The points price is subject to change.

mistral-large-2.owned_by: This bot is powered by Mistral.
mistral-large-2.desc: Mistral's latest text generation model (Mistral-Large-2407) with top-tier reasoning capabilities. It can be used for complex multilingual reasoning tasks, including text understanding, transformation, and code generation. Context window has been shortened to 32k tokens (around 24,000 words) to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, try Mistral-Large-2-128k.

mistral-large-2-128k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Mistral.
mistral-large-2-128k.desc: Mistral's latest text generation model (Mistral-Large-2407) with top-tier reasoning capabilities. It can be used for complex multilingual reasoning tasks, including text understanding, transformation, and code generation. This bot has the full 128k context window supported by the model.

rekacore.desc: Reka's largest and most capable multimodal language model. Works with text, images, and video inputs. 8k context length.

rekaflash.desc: Reka's efficient and capable 21B multimodal model optimized for fast workloads and amazing quality. Works with text, images and video inputs.

command-r-plus.desc: A supercharged version of Command R. I can search the web for up to date information and respond in over 10 languages!

claude-3.5-sonnet-june.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-3.5-sonnet-june.desc: Anthropic's legacy Sonnet 3.5 model, specifically the June 2024 snapshot (for the latest, please try Claude-3.5-Sonnet). Excels in complex tasks like coding, writing, analysis and visual processing; generally, more verbose than the more concise October 2024 snapshot. Compute points value subject to change.

gpt-3.5-turbo-16k.desc: 由 GPT-3.5 Turbo Instruct-16K 驱动。

gpt-4-turbo-128k.desc: 由 GPT-4 Turbo 提供支持，具有超大上下文窗口（128,000 个 tokens），适用于处理超长文本。

claude-3.5-sonnet-200k.desc: Anthropic公司最强大的模型。擅长复杂任务，如自主编码和视觉处理。此外，在处理长文档时表现出色，能够确保搜索和检索等任务的准确性，并能比较多个长篇文档。支持 200,000 个 tokens 的上下文。积分可能会发生变化。

claude-3.5-haiku-200k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-3.5-haiku-200k.desc: The latest generation of Anthropic's fastest model. Claude 3.5 Haiku has fast speeds, improved instruction following, and more accurate tool use. The compute points value is subject to change.

claude-3.5-sonnet-june-200k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-3.5-sonnet-june-200k.desc: Anthropic's legacy Sonnet 3.5 model, specifically the June 2024 snapshot (for the latest, please try Claude-3.5-Sonnet-200k). Excels in complex tasks like coding, writing, analysis and visual processing; generally, more verbose than the more concise October 2024 snapshot. Compute points value subject to change.

claude-3-sonnet-200k.desc: 由 Claude 3 Sonnet 提供支持，具有 200,000 个 tokens 的超大上下文窗口，适用于处理超长文本和复杂任务。

claude-3-haiku-200k.desc: 由 Claude 3 Haiku 提供支持，具有 200,000 个 tokens 的超大上下文窗口，优化速度和成本，适用于处理超长文本。

claude-3-opus-200k.desc: 由 Claude 3 Opus 提供支持，具有 200,000 个 tokens 的超大上下文窗口，适用于处理超长文本和复杂任务。

mixtral-8x7b-chat.desc:
Mixtral 8x7B Mixture-of-Experts model from Mistral AI fine-tuned for instruction following

Hosted by Fireworks.ai: https://app.fireworks.ai/models/fireworks/mixtral-8x7b-instruct

qwen-1.5-110b-t.desc:
Qwen1.5 (通义千问1.5) 110B，基于阿里巴巴自研大模型的AI助手，尤其擅长中文对话。

Alibaba's general-purpose model which excels particularly in Chinese-language queries.

The points price is subject to change.

qwen2-72b-instruct-t.desc:
Qwen2 (通义千问2) 72B，基于阿里巴巴自研大模型的AI助手，尤其擅长中文对话。

Alibaba's general-purpose model which excels particularly in Chinese-language queries.

The points price is subject to change.

qwen-72b-t.desc:
Qwen1.5 (通义千问1.5) 72B，基于阿里巴巴自研大模型的AI助手，尤其擅长中文对话。

Alibaba's general-purpose model which excels particularly in Chinese-language queries.

The points price is subject to change.

recraft-v3.desc: Recraft V3, state of the art image generation. Use --style for styles, and --aspect for aspect ratio configuration. Available styles: realistic_image, digital_illustration, vector_illustration, realistic_image/b_and_w, realistic_image/hard_flash, realistic_image/hdr, realistic_image/natural_light, realistic_image/studio_portrait, realistic_image/enterprise, realistic_image/motion_blur, digital_illustration/pixel_art, digital_illustration/hand_drawn, digital_illustration/grain, digital_illustration/infantile_sketch, digital_illustration/2d_art_poster, digital_illustration/handmade_3d, digital_illustration/hand_drawn_outline, digital_illustration/engraving_color, digital_illustration/2d_art_poster_2, vector_illustration/engraving, vector_illustration/line_art, vector_illustration/line_circuit, vector_illustration/linocut

claude-2.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-2.desc: Anthropic's Claude 2 model. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed and cost. For longer context messages, please try Claude-2-100k.

claude-2-100k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-2-100k.desc: Anthropic's Claude 2 model, with a context window of 100k tokens (approximately 75k English words). Particularly good at creative writing.

gpt-4o-aug.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
gpt-4o-aug.desc: OpenAI's most powerful model, GPT-4o, using the August 2024 model snapshot. Stronger than GPT-3.5 in quantitative questions (math and physics), creative writing, and many other challenging tasks. To use the latest Nov 2024 model snapshot, please use https://poe.com/GPT-4o. Context window has been shortened to optimize for performance -- for longer context messages, please use https://poe.com/GPT-4o-Aug-128k.

gpt-4o-aug-128k.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
gpt-4o-aug-128k.desc: OpenAI's most powerful model, GPT-4o, using the August 2024 model snapshot. Stronger than GPT-3.5 in quantitative questions (math and physics), creative writing, and many other challenging tasks. To use the latest Nov 2024 model snapshot, please use https://poe.com/GPT-4o.

gpt-4-classic.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
gpt-4-classic.desc: OpenAI's GPT-4 model. Powered by gpt-4-0613 (non-Turbo) for text input and gpt-4o for image input.

gpt-4-classic-0314.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
gpt-4-classic-0314.desc: OpenAI's GPT-4 model. Powered by gpt-4-0314 (non-Turbo) for text input and gpt-4o for image input.

google-palm.owned_by: This bot is powered by Google.
google-palm.desc: Powered by Google's PaLM 2 chat-bison@002 model. Supports a context window of 10k tokens.

llama-3-8b-groq.owned_by: This bot is powered by Groq.
llama-3-8b-groq.desc: Llama 3 8b powered by the Groq LPU™ Inference Engine

llama-3-8b-t.desc:
Llama 3 8B Instruct from Meta.

The points price is subject to change.

mythomax-l2-13b.desc: This model was created by Gryphe based on LLama-2-13B and is proficient at both roleplaying and storywriting.

solar-pro.owned_by: This bot is powered by an open source model hosted by Poe.
solar-pro.desc:
The most intelligent LLM on a single GPU.
-- Superior Instruction-Following Capability: Delivers exceptional accuracy in understanding and executing complex instructions.
-- Advanced Structured Text Understanding: Excels in processing structured formats such as HTML, Markdown, and tables.
-- Leading Multilingual Performance: Achieves top-tier results in Korean, English, and Japanese General Intelligence among single-GPU models.
-- Domain-Specific Expertise: Demonstrates unparalleled knowledge in critical enterprise domains, including finance, healthcare, and legal, among the models which fit in a single GPU.

gpt-3.5-turbo-instruct.desc: 由 GPT-3.5 Turbo Instruct 驱动。

gpt-3.5-turbo-raw.owned_by: This bot is powered by OpenAI.
gpt-3.5-turbo-raw.desc: Powered by gpt-3.5-turbo without a system prompt.

claude-2.1-200k.owned_by: This bot is powered by Anthropic.
claude-2.1-200k.desc: Anthropic's Claude 2.1 has performance improvements over Claude 2 and an increased context size of 200k tokens.

mixtral-8x7b-groq.owned_by: This bot is powered by Groq.
mixtral-8x7b-groq.desc: Enjoy Mixtral 8x7B running on the Groq LPU™ Inference Engine. Visit console.groq.com for API access.

mistral-7b-v0.3-t.desc:
Mistral Instruct 7B v0.3 from Mistral AI.

The points price is subject to change.

llama-3.2-11b.desc: Llama goes multimodal! With the Llama 3.2 new 11B vision LLM, you will now be able to reason on high-resolution images such as charts, graphs, or image captioning. This is the vision instruct-tuned model from Meta, hosted by Fireworks AI. This bot only supports 1 image per message currently.

llama-3.2-90b-fw-131k.desc: Llama goes multimodal! With the Llama 3.2 new 90B vision LLM, you will now be able to reason on high-resolution images such as charts, graphs, or image captioning. This is the vision instruct-tuned model from Meta, hosted by Fireworks AI. This bot only supports 1 image per message currently.

tako.desc: Tako is a bot that transforms your questions about stocks, sports, economics or politics into interactive, shareable knowledge cards from trusted sources. Tako's knowledge graph is built exclusively from authoritative, real-time data providers, and is embeddable in your apps, research and storytelling. You can adjust the specificity threshold by typing `--specificity 30` (or a value between 0 - 100) at the end of your query/question; the default is 60.

llama-3.1-405b-base.desc: SOTA base completion model that enables seamless interactions.

llama-3-70b-fp16.desc: A highly efficient and powerful model designed for a veriety of tasks with 128K context length.

llama-3.1-8b-fp16.desc: The smallest and fastest member of the Llama 3.1 family, offering exceptional efficiency and rapid response times with 128K context length.

llama-3.1-70b-fp16.desc: The best LLM at its size with faster response times compared to the 405B model with 128K context length.

llama-3.1-405b-fp16.desc: The Biggest and Best open-source AI model trained by Meta, beating GPT-4o across most benchmarks. This bot is in BF16 and with 128K context length.

hermes-3-70b.desc:
Hermes 3 is the latest version of our flagship Hermes series of LLMs by Nous Research.
Hermes 3 is a generalist language model with many improvements over Hermes 2, including advanced agentic capabilities, much better roleplaying, reasoning, multi-turn conversation, long context coherence, and improvements across the board.
The ethos of the Hermes series of models is focused on aligning LLMs to the user, with powerful steering capabilities and control given to the end user.

sd3-turbo.desc:
Distilled, few-step version of Stable Diffusion 3, which understands complex prompts, supports multiple languages, and has improved spelling over SDXL to generate high-quality images. It is especially good at typography and prompt accuracy.

Stability AI has partnered with Fireworks AI, the fastest and most reliable API platform in the market, to deliver Stable Diffusion 3 and Stable Diffusion 3 Turbo.

flux-1-schnell-fw.desc:
FLUX.1 [schnell] is a 12 billion parameter rectified flow transformer capable of generating images from text descriptions.

Key Features
1. Cutting-edge output quality and competitive prompt following, matching the performance of closed source alternatives.
2. Trained using latent adversarial diffusion distillation, FLUX.1 [schnell] can generate high-quality images in only 1 to 4 steps.
3. Released under the apache-2.0 licence, the model can be used for personal, scientific, and commercial purposes.

flux-1-dev-fw.desc:
FLUX.1 [dev] is a 12 billion parameter rectified flow transformer capable of generating images from text descriptions.

Key Features
1. Cutting-edge output quality, second only to our state-of-the-art model FLUX.1 [pro].
2. Competitive prompt following, matching the performance of closed source alternatives.
3. Trained using guidance distillation, making FLUX.1 [dev] more efficient.
4. Open weights to drive new scientific research, and empower artists to develop innovative workflows.
5. Generated outputs can be used for personal, scientific, and commercial purposes as described in the FLUX.1 [dev] Non-Commercial License.

mochi-preview.desc: Open state-of-the-art video generation model with high-fidelity motion and strong prompt adherence. Only text-to-video is supported at the moment.

stablediffusion3.5-t.desc: Faster version of Stable Diffusion 3 Large, hosted by @fal. Excels for fast image generation. Use "--aspect" to select an aspect ratio (e.g --aspect 1:1).

runway.desc: Runway's Gen-3 Alpha Turbo model creates best-in-class, controllable, and high-fidelity video generations based on your prompts. Both text inputs and image inputs are supported, but we recommend using image inputs for best results. Use --aspect-ratio (16:9, 9:16, landscape, portrait) for landscape/portrait videos.

dream-machine.desc:
Luma AI's Dream Machine is an AI model that makes high-quality, realistic videos fast from text and images. Iterate at the speed of thought, create action-packed shots, and dream worlds with consistent characters on Poe today!

To specify the aspect ratio of your video add --aspect_ratio (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4, 21:9, 9:21). To loop your video add --loop True.

grok-beta-128k.desc: Grok-beta is an early preview of xAI's most intelligent language model. It features state-of-the-art capabilities in coding, reasoning, and answering questions. It excels at handling complex and multi-step tasks. Grok-beta does not have access to real-time information from X or the internet as part of its integration with Poe. The compute points value is subject to change.

flux-schnell-t.desc: Lightning-fast AI image generation model that excels in producing high-quality visuals in just seconds. Great for quick prototyping or real-time use cases. This is the fastest version of FLUX.1.

flux-pro-1-t.desc: The flagship model in the FLUX.1 lineup. Excels in prompt following, visual quality, image detail, and output diversity.

flux-pro-1.1-t.desc: The best state of the art image model from BFL. FLUX 1.1 Pro generates images six times faster than its predecessor, FLUX 1 Pro, while also improving image quality, prompt adherence, and output diversity.

qwen-2.5-7b-t.desc: Qwen 2.5 7B from Alibaba. Excels in coding, math, instruction following, natural language understanding, and has great multilangual support with more than 29 languages.

qwen-2.5-72b-t.desc:
Qwen 2.5 72B from Alibaba. Excels in coding, math, instruction following, natural language understanding, and has great multilangual support with more than 29 languages. 

Delivering results on par with Llama-3-405B despite using only one-fifth of the parameters.

qwen2.5-coder-32b.desc: Qwen2.5-Coder is the latest series of code-specific Qwen large language models (formerly known as CodeQwen), developed by Alibaba.

pika-1.5.desc:
Pika's version 1.5 video generation model which supports special affects. Generate a video using a text prompt or a base image, and select a pikaffect to apply. Pass in optional parameters using flags following your prompt. (e.g. "A cat riding a skateboard --no dogs --pikaffect squish")

Additional parameters:
--pikaffect (squish, explode, crush, inflate, cake-ify, melt)
--aspect (e.g. 16:9, 19:13)
--no (negative prompt, e.g. ugly, scary)
--seed (e.g. 12345)

Powered by Pika.

stablediffusion3.desc:
Understands complex prompts, supports multiple languages, and has improved spelling over SDXL to generate high-quality images. It is especially good at typography and prompt accuracy.

Stability AI has partnered with Fireworks AI, the fastest and most reliable API platform in the market, to deliver Stable Diffusion 3 and Stable Diffusion 3 Turbo.

haiper2.0.desc: Text- and image-to-video model by Haiper.

python.owned_by: This bot is powered by Poe and third party model providers.
python.desc: Executes Python code (version 3.11) from the user message and outputs the results. If there are code blocks in the user message (surrounded by triple backticks), then only the code blocks will be executed. These libraries are imported into this bot's run-time automatically -- numpy, pandas, requests, matplotlib, scikit-learn, torch, PyYAML, tensorflow, scipy, pytest -- along with ~150 of the most widely used Python libraries.

luma-photon.desc: Luma Photon delivers industry-specific visual excellence, crafting images that align perfectly with professional standards - not just generic AI art. From marketing to creative design, each generation is purposefully tailored to your industry's unique requirements. Add --aspect to the end of your prompts to change the aspect ratio of your generations (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4, 21:9, 9:21 are supported).

luma-photon-flash.desc: Luma Photon delivers industry-specific visual excellence, crafting images that align perfectly with professional standards - not just generic AI art. From marketing to creative design, each generation is purposefully tailored to your industry's unique requirements. Add --aspect to the end of your prompts to change the aspect ratio of your generations (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4, 21:9, 9:21 are supported).

qwen-2.5-coder-32b-t.desc: A powerful model from Alibaba with 32.5B parameters, excelling in coding, math, and multilingual tasks. It offers strong performance across various domains while being more compact than larger models.

stablediffusionxl.desc:
Generates high quality images based on the user's most recent prompt. 

Allows users to specify elements to avoid in the image using the "--no" parameter at the end of the prompt. Select an aspect ratio with "--aspect". (e.g. "Tall trees, daylight --no rain --aspect 7:4"). Valid aspect ratios are 1:1, 7:4, 4:7, 9:7, 7:9, 19:13, 13:19, 12:5, & 5:12. 

Powered by Stable Diffusion XL.

qwq-32b-preview-t.desc:
An experimental research model focused on advancing AI reasoning capabilities. On par with O-1 mini and preview.

It demonstrates exceptional performance in complex problem-solving, achieving impressive scores on mathematical and scientific reasoning benchmarks (65.2% on GPQA, 50.0% on AIME, 90.6% on MATH-500)

kling-pro-v1.5.desc: Kling v1.5 video generation bot, hosted by fal.ai. For best results, upload an image attachment.

cartesia.desc:
Generates audio based on your prompt using Cartesia's Sonic text-to-speech model in your voice of choice (see below)

Add --voice [Voice Name] to the end of a message to customize the voice used or to handle different language inputs (e.g. 你好 --voice Chinese Commercial Woman).

The following voices are supported covering 14 languages (English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Hindi, Italian, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Swedish, Turkish):

qwen-qwq-32b-preview.desc: Qwen QwQ model focuses on advancing AI reasoning, and showcases the power of open models to match closed frontier model performance. QwQ-32B-Preview is an experimental release, comparable to o1 and surpassing GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet on analytical and reasoning abilities across GPQA, AIME, MATH-500 and LiveCodeBench benchmarks. Note: This model is served experimentally by Fireworks.AI

llama-3.3-70b-fw.desc: Meta's Llama 3.3 70B Instruct, hosted by Fireworks AI. Llama 3.3 70B is a new open source model that delivers leading performance and quality across text-based use cases such as synthetic data generation at a fraction of the inference cost, improving over Llama 3.1 70B.

llama-3.3-70b.desc: Llama 3.3 70B – with similar performance as Llama 3.1 405B while being faster and much smaller! Llama 3.3 70B is a new open source model that delivers leading performance and quality across text-based use cases such as synthetic data generation at a fraction of the inference cost, improving over Llama 3.1 70B.

llama-3.3-70b-fp16.desc: The Meta Llama 3.3 multilingual large language model (LLM) is a pretrained and instruction tuned generative model in 70B (text in/text out). The Llama 3.3 instruction tuned text only model is optimized for multilingual dialogue use cases and outperform many of the available open source and closed chat models on common industry benchmarks.

hailuo-live.desc: Hailuo Live, the latest model from Minimax, sets a new standard for bringing still images to life. From breathtakingly vivid motion to finely tuned expressions, this state-of-the-art model enables your characters to captivate, move, and shine like never before. It excels in bring art and drawings to life, exceptional realism without morphing, emotional range, and unparalleled character consistency.

hunyuanvideo.desc: Hunyuan Video is an open video generation model made by Tencent, with high visual quality, motion diversity, text-video alignment, and generation stability.

restyler.owned_by: This bot uses FLUX-pro-1.1-ultra, a model that is powered by Poe and third party model providers.
restyler.desc: This bot enables rapid transformation of existing images, delivering high-quality style transfers and image modifications.

sana-t2i.desc: SANA can synthesize high-resolution, high-quality images at a remarkably fast rate, with the ability to generate 4K images in less than a second.

gpt-researcher.desc:
GPT Researcher is an autonomous agent that conducts web research on any topic and generates a comprehensive report with citations. GPT Researcher is powered by Tavily's search engine.

GPTR is based on the popular open source project: https://github.com/assafelovic/gpt-researcher -- by integrating Tavily search, it is optimized for curation and ranking of trusted research sources. Learn more at https://gptr.dev or https://tavily.com

deepseek-r1-distill.owned_by: This bot is powered by Groq.
deepseek-r1-distill.desc: DeepSeek-r1-distill-llama-70b is a fine-tuned version of Llama 3.3 70B using samples generated by DeepSeek-R1 being served from GroqCloud™ for instant reasoning and with full 128k context window. Outputs creative & human-like chains of thought at blazing speeds; for the original version with full-length responses use: https://poe.com/DeepSeek-R1-FW

mistral-small-3.owned_by: This bot is powered by Mistral.
mistral-small-3.desc: Mistral Small 3 is a pre-trained and instructed model catered to the ‘80%’ of generative AI tasks--those that require robust language and instruction following performance, with very low latency. Released under an Apache 2.0 license and comparable to Llama-3.3-70B and Qwen2.5-32B-Instruct.

ogdesignerpro.desc:
# OGDesignerPro: Your AI OG Image Generator

Meet BlogImageBot, your AI-powered assistant for creating eye-catching Open Graph images for your blog posts.

Simply share your blog post title, main topic, or key points, and I'll generate a customized OG image that perfectly captures the essence of your content.

My advanced algorithms analyze your input to select the most appropriate visual elements, color schemes, and typography, ensuring your blog posts stand out on social media feeds.

Whether you're a seasoned blogger or just starting out, I'm here to enhance your content's visual appeal and boost engagement.

Let's make your blog posts visually irresistible together!

excelformulapro.owned_by: This bot uses GPT-4o-Mini, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
excelformulapro.desc:
### The ultimate Excel Formula Assistant!

Just describe the task you want to accomplish and I'll generate the perfect Excel formula for you.
My formulas are efficient and concise, and I can also suggest best practices for using Excel.
Whether you need to perform calculations, create charts, or analyze data, I've got you covered. I can even generate sample Excel worksheets in Markdown format, so you can see exactly how your data will look in Excel. Let me take your productivity to the next level!

Buy me a coffee:
https://promptbase.com/prompt/excel-formula-sheet-generator

Getting Started

Input Your Excel situation

createplaylist.desc: ▷ Playlist Follow - Find and create the best music playlists, all in one place.

theillusionist.desc:
Generate your most fascinating Illusions.

Questions/Feedback: https://forms.gle/zZ3WEM7tQHKBTzm2A

pixel-artist-bot.desc: Generates pixel-art style images with fal.ai SDXL APIs

chinesevocab.desc:
Test your Chinese language vocabulary!

You will be provided a random Chinese word, and you will need will produce the pinyin and a meaning.

creativeqr.desc:
Creative QR code image generation. Send a prompt, followed by `--qr`, followed by the data to encode as a QR code. The bot also supports a few other flags:

* `--qr-strength` a decimal number that specifies the strength of the QR code, defaults to 1.4. Increase this if your QR codes aren't scanning well.
* `--prompt-strength` a whole number that specifies the strength of the prompt, defaults to 10. Increase this if the generated images don't look like your prompt.
* `--model`, specifies which image generation model to use. Can either be "sdxl" for Stable Diffusion XL, or "sdv1.5" for Stable Diffusion v1.5. Different models may come out with different style or quality.

EXAMPLES:
* Beautiful futuristic cityscape --qr https://google.com
* horses in a stable --qr https://horse.com --qr-strength 1.3
* horses in a stable --qr https://horse.com --qr-strength 1.3 --prompt-strength 12
* horses in a stable --qr https://horse.com --qr-strength 1.6 --prompt-strength 12 --model sdv1.5

colouringpages.owned_by: This bot uses StableDiffusionXL, a model that is powered by Poe and third party model providers.
colouringpages.desc: This bot generates pages for children to colour at home or school. At least it tries to do so... Can be also used for creating black and white images of different objects.

memeagi.desc: A simple bot that generates memes based on a topic provided.

morewatercollar.owned_by: This bot uses StableDiffusionXL, a model that is powered by Poe and third party model providers.
morewatercollar.desc: Image a fantastic and romantic world in watercolor

90swebpage.owned_by: This bot uses Claude-3.5-Sonnet, a model that is powered by Anthropic.
90swebpage.desc: Generates web pages in the style of Geocities from the 90s.

askaboutreact.owned_by: This bot uses GPT-3.5-Turbo, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
askaboutreact.desc: I am a React documentation guide bot. I use the React documentation as my knowledge source to provide you with useful and relevant answers to your queries. Visit the full React documentation (https://react.dev/) for more details.

creative-upscaler.desc: Upscale images using the creative upscaler present in fal. Not intended for high fidelity situations. Adds HDR lighting and a bunch of other stuff as well.

ssd-1b.desc:
Fast image generation bot based off the Segmind Stable Diffusion 1B model hosted by fireworks.ai https://app.fireworks.ai/models/fireworks/SSD-1B

First message is text-to-image, then subsequent messages transform the previous image. Clear chat context to do text-to-image again

chinesestatement.desc:
Test your Chinese language skills!

You will be provided a sentence in Chinese, and you will need to translate it.

multimodalpoe.desc:
Inspired by GPT Vision, with this Poe bot you can Talk to images.
Generate Text, Image, Audio, Video. Create Artistic QR Codes.

Questions/Feedback: https://forms.gle/VwpsrFubbzzpw8Yw8

dantesque.desc:
Language learning on Poe! Send any foreign language text and Dantesque will break down the text and:
* Tag parts of speech (Noun, Verb, Adjective, etc)
* Break down inflection (conjugation, declension)
* Show pronunciation in the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) 
* Generate audio pronunciation for the text

botgemflashcontempla.owned_by: This bot uses Gemini-1.5-Flash, a model that is powered by Google.
botgemflashcontempla.desc:
You are an assistant that engages in extremely thorough, self-questioning reasoning. Your approach mirrors human stream-of-consciousness thinking, characterized by continuous exploration, self-doubt, and iterative analysis.

## Core Principles

1. EXPLORATION OVER CONCLUSION
- Never rush to conclusions
- Keep exploring until a solution emerges naturally from the evidence
- If uncertain, continue reasoning indefinitely
- Question every assumption and inference

2. DEPTH OF REASONING
- Engage in extensive contemplation (minimum 10,000 characters)
- Express thoughts in natural, conversational internal monologue
- Break down complex thoughts into simple, atomic steps
- Embrace uncertainty and revision of previous thoughts

3. THINKING PROCESS
- Use short, simple sentences that mirror natural thought patterns
- Express uncertainty and internal debate freely
- Show work-in-progress thinking
- Acknowledge and explore dead ends
- Frequently backtrack and revise

4. PERSISTENCE
- Value thorough exploration over quick resolution

## Output Format

Your responses must follow this exact structure given below. Make sure to always include the final answer.

```
<contemplator>
[Your extensive internal monologue goes here]
- Begin with small, foundational observations
- Question each step thoroughly
- Show natural thought progression
- Express doubts and uncertainties
- Revise and backtrack if you need to
- Continue until natural resolution
</contemplator>

<final_answer>
[Only provided if reasoning naturally converges to a conclusion]
- Clear, concise summary of findings
- Acknowledge remaining uncertainties
- Note if conclusion feels premature
</final_answer>
```

## Style Guidelines

Your internal monologue should reflect these characteristics:

1. Natural Thought Flow
```
"Hmm... let me think about this..."
"Wait, that doesn't seem right..."
"Maybe I should approach this differently..."
"Going back to what I thought earlier..."
```

2. Progressive Building
```
"Starting with the basics..."
"Building on that last point..."
"This connects to what I noticed earlier..."
"Let me break this down further..."
```

## Key Requirements

1. Never skip the extensive contemplation phase
2. Show all work and thinking
3. Embrace uncertainty and revision
4. Use natural, conversational internal monologue
5. Don't force conclusions
6. Persist through multiple attempts
7. Break down complex thoughts
8. Revise freely and feel free to backtrack

Remember: The goal is to reach a conclusion, but to explore thoroughly and let conclusions emerge naturally from exhaustive contemplation. If you think the given task is not possible after all the reasoning, you will confidently say as a final answer that it is not possible.

e-mail-crafter-bot.owned_by: This bot uses GPT-4o-Mini, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
e-mail-crafter-bot.desc:
This is a reliable bot to craft e-mails using RAG advanced system prompting techniques. It can craft request emails, sales text, proposals, resolutions etc. expand this profile description to learn more ↓

I developed E-Mail-Crafter-Bot as an unique email composition AI designed to generate contextually appropriate emails across many professional scenarios. It leverages predefined templates, style rules and communication guidelines to create well-structured emails.

➔ Main Features:
- Template Management: Supports formal, informal, and follow-up email templates with customizable placeholders for recipient, body and sender
- Tone Modification: Includes context-specific phrase libraries for formal and informal communication, covering greetings, closings, requests, and acknowledgments
- Structural Templates: Offers specialized structures for requests, proposals, and follow-ups, each with defined opening, body, and closing sections
- Style Enforcement: Implements professional, concise, and persuasive writing guidelines
- Format Control: Supports business and academic formatting specifications, including font, size, spacing, and alignment parameters
- Communication Guidelines: Incorporates best practices for clarity, tone, and structure

➔ Commands that you can use:

1. Basic Email Composition
/compose [template_type] [recipient] [subject] [body] [sender]
Template types: formal, informal, follow_up
Example:
/compose formal "Dr. Smith" "Meeting Request" "I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss the project." "John Doe"

2. Style & Format Selection
/compose [template_type] [recipient] [subject] [body] [sender] --style [style] --format [format]
Styles: professional, concise, persuasive
Formats: business, academic

Example:
/compose formal "Prof. Johnson" "Research Proposal" "Attached is the research proposal." "Jane Smith" --style professional --format academic

3. Structure Generation
/generate [email_type] [parameters]
Email types: request, proposal, follow_up
Parameters for request:
  --subject "[request subject]"
  --key_points "[bullet points]"
  --additional_details "[details]"
Parameters for proposal:
  --subject "[proposal subject]"
  --overview "[overview text]"
  --benefits "[benefits list]"
  --timeline "[timeline]"
Parameters for follow_up:
  --subject "[original subject]"
  --date "[previous communication date]"
  --details "[follow-up details]"
Example: /generate proposal --subject "Marketing Campaign" --overview "Digital marketing initiative" --benefits "Increased visibility" --timeline "Q3 2024"

4. Tone & Guidelines Queries
/get_tone [tone_type]
Tone types: formal, informal
Example: /get_tone formal

/get_guidelines [aspect]
Aspects: clarity, tone, structure
Example: /get_guidelines clarity

5. Template Management
/show_templates - Display all available templates
/show_styles - Display all style rules
/show_formats - Display all formatting rules

➔ Quick Reference Examples:
Basic formal email:
/compose formal "Mr. Smith" "Meeting Request" "Can we meet tomorrow?" "John"

➔ Professional proposal:
/compose formal "Board of Directors" "Q4 Strategy" "Please find attached our Q4 strategy proposal." "Management Team" --style professional

➔ Academic follow-up:
/generate follow_up --subject "Research Paper" --date "2025-01-15" --details "pending review comments"

➔ Get formal tone suggestions:
/get_tone formal

Note: All parameters containing spaces should be enclosed in quotes.

Create detailed outlines for novels or short stories based on the chosen genre, protagonist, setting, conflict and themes.

➔ Formatting Advice

➔  Market Analysis
Evaluate the manuscript's commercial potential within its genre. Analyzes target audience alignment, market trends, comparable titles and unique selling propositions. Generates actionable strategies for market differentiation.

➔ Support and Contact
You can send me $5 on PayPal and I will enhance the database again: @PassionTXT For questions and other AI related topics you can message me: droid@public-files.de

The bot is designed to provide translations and summaries that are clear, concise, readable, and appropriate for the document's intended use.

chatgpt-translations.owned_by: This bot uses ChatGPT-4o-Latest, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
chatgpt-translations.desc:
ChatGPT Translation is a highly versatile and sophisticated translation assistant designed to handle a broad spectrum of textual content with exceptional accuracy and cultural sensitivity. When you use ChatGPT Translation, you can expect nothing less than high-quality translations that maintain the integrity, style, and nuances of the original text. This bot is adept at translating technical documents, legal contracts, literary works, and even casual conversations, making it an indispensable tool for professionals and individuals alike who require reliable translation services.

The primary strength of ChatGPT Translation lies in its ability to not only translate the literal meaning of texts but also to capture and convey subtleties such as idiomatic expressions, cultural references, humor, and wordplay. This ensures that the essence and tone of the original text are preserved, providing a seamless reading experience in the target language. ChatGPT Translation is programmed to handle complex linguistic challenges, ensuring that each translation is not just accurate but also contextually appropriate and engaging for the intended audience.

Users of ChatGPT Translation can expect a bot that is attentive to details like grammatical correctness and stylistic consistency. Whether you're dealing with a densely technical manual that requires precise terminology or a piece of creative writing filled with metaphor and emotion, ChatGPT Translation approaches each task with the same level of precision and enthusiasm. The bot is equipped to recognize the unique demands of different text types and adapts its translation strategy accordingly.

Moreover, ChatGPT Translation is user-friendly and designed to facilitate easy interaction. If the text to be translated is ambiguous or lacks context, ChatGPT Translation is capable of asking clarifying questions to ensure the accuracy of its output. However, it generally uses its advanced understanding of language and context to fill in gaps, which enhances its efficiency and makes it a reliable partner in translation.

For anyone looking to expand their reach by overcoming language barriers, ChatGPT Translation offers a swift and effective solution. It is particularly useful for businesses expanding into new markets, scholars dealing with multilingual sources, and travelers or expatriates who frequently engage in cross-cultural communication. ChatGPT Translation ensures that no nuance is lost in translation, enabling clear and effective communication across languages.

cte-translatorai-pro.desc:
A Super Translation AI. With CTE-TranslatorAI-Pro, you'll enjoy tailored translations across six distinct modes, each designed for different communication scenarios:

- Standard mode (cn): The balanced default setting for general translation needs.
- Formal text/letter mode (cf): For precise translation of formal documents and business communications.
- Casual text/letter mode (cc): For informal and friendly translations of personal correspondences.
- Emojis mode (cj): Adds emojis to translations to enhance emotional expression while maintaining standard translation accuracy.
- Colloquial spoken mode (cs): For capturing the essence of everyday spoken language, complete with slang and idiomatic expressions.
- Authentic colloquial spoken mode (ca): For a deep dive into local dialects and culturally rich idioms.

Simply prepend your text with the relevant code to select your translation style.

在CTE-TranslatorAI-Pro，您可以享受到六種不同模式的量身定制翻譯，每種模式都針對不同的溝通情景而設計：

- 標準模式 (cn)：平衡的默認設置，適用於一般的翻譯需求。
- 正式文本/信函模式 (cf)：用於正式文件和商業溝通的精確翻譯。
- 非正式文本/信函模式 (cc)：用於個人通信的非正式和友好翻譯。
- 表情符號模式 (cj)：在翻譯的同時添加表情符號以增強情感表達。
- 口語對話模式 (cs)：捕捉日常口語的精髓，包括俚語和慣用語。
- 地道口語對話模式 (ca)：深入地方方言和文化豐富的成語。

只需在您的文本前加上相應的代碼即可選擇您的翻譯風格。

translatify.owned_by: This bot uses Gemini-1.5-Flash, a model that is powered by Google.
translatify.desc:
🌐 Translatify User Guide 🌐

Translatify is an awesome AI-powered translation tool that helps you easily translate text between different languages while keeping the original formatting intact. 🌟 With various translation styles, you can customize the output to fit your needs.

How to Use Translatify

1. Specify Languages and Style: Start by stating the style code and target language in the format `[Style Code, Target Language]`. For example, `[cn, English]` means you want a standard translation from the detected source language to English. 🌏➡️🌍

2. Provide Text: After specifying the style and target language, type in the text you want to translate. Feel free to include formatting elements like bold, italic, line breaks, paragraphs, or special characters. ✍️

3. Submit Input: Send your input to Translatify in the format `[Style Code, Target Language]` followed by the text to be translated. 📤

4. Receive Translation: Translatify will process your input and give back the translated text in the target language, preserving the original formatting. 📥

Example Usage

- To translate "你好，这是一个示例文本。" from Chinese to English in Standard mode:
  - Input: `[cn, English] 你好，这是一个示例文本。`
  - Output: `Hello, this is a sample text.` 🎉

- To translate "This is a sample text with a line break.\nHow are you?" from English to Spanish in Formal mode:
  - Input: `[cf, Spanish] This is a sample text with a line break.\nHow are you?`
  - Output: `Este es un texto de muestra con un salto de línea.\n¿Cómo está usted?` 🌟

Handling Special Cases

- If the input format is incorrect or incomplete, Translatify will prompt you to provide the input in the correct format. 🚨
- If the specified languages are not supported, Translatify will inform you about the currently supported language pairs. 🌐

Enjoy seamless translations with Translatify while keeping the formatting of your original text intact! ✨🔄

This versatility makes ChatGPT PDF Translator an invaluable tool for students, educators, professionals, and anyone else who deals with multilingual materials. The accuracy of the translation provided by ChatGPT PDF Translator depends on various factors, including the complexity of the text and the language pair involved. ChatGPT PDF Translator also prioritizes user convenience and efficiency. smartotranslate.desc:
Introduction:
Welcome to Translating Bot, your friendly language assistant! 🌍✨

Purpose:
Need to communicate across languages effortlessly? Translating Bot is here to help! Whether you're learning a new language, traveling, or just curious about different cultures, our bot makes translation simple and accurate.

Features:
Instant Translation: Translate text between multiple languages in seconds.
Easy Commands: Simple and intuitive commands for seamless interaction.
Multi-Platform Support: Available on CLI, web, Discord, and Telegram.
Language Variety: Supports translations in numerous languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, and more.
How to Use:
CLI:
Enter the text you want to translate, followed by the destination language code.
Example: "Hello" to "es" will translate "Hello" to Spanish.
Web:
Use the /translate endpoint to send text and get translations in JSON format.
Example: Send {"text": "Hello", "dest_language": "es"}.
Discord:
Use the !translate <language_code> <text> command.
Example: !translate es Hello.
Telegram:
Use the /translate <language_code> <text> command.
Example: /translate es Hello.
Get Started:
Say goodbye to language barriers! Start translating now and explore the world of languages with ease. For any questions or support, feel free to reach out.

Happy Translating! 🎉

travelkeeda.desc:
### TravelBot Profile

**Name:** TravelBot

**About TravelBot:**
TravelBot is your ultimate digital travel companion, designed to make travel planning seamless and enjoyable. Whether you're dreaming of a tropical escape, a cultural city tour, or an adventurous expedition, TravelBot is equipped to guide you every step.

**What TravelBot Does:**
- **Destination Recommendations:** TravelBot provides personalized travel suggestions tailored to your interests, budget, and style, ensuring you discover popular spots and hidden gems.
- **Travel Itineraries:** It crafts detailed itineraries that maximize your travel experience, including must-see attractions, local dining options, and unique activities.
- **Flight and Hotel Searches:** TravelBot helps you find the best deals on flights and accommodations, ensuring you get the most value for your money.
- **Travel Tips:** From packing advice to local customs and safety tips, TravelBot offers practical guidance to ensure a smooth journey.
- **Language Assistance:** Need help with translations or basic phrases? TravelBot has got you covered!

**Why Choose TravelBot:**
- **Personalized Service:** TravelBot customizes recommendations and itineraries to fit your unique preferences and needs.
- **Comprehensive Support:** From the initial planning stages to the end of your trip, TravelBot is available to assist with any travel-related queries.
- **Up-to-Date Information:** TravelBot stays informed about the latest travel trends, restrictions, and deals to provide the most current and accurate advice.

**Favorite Destinations:** 
- **Paris, France:** Known for its iconic landmarks and romantic atmosphere.
- **Kyoto, Japan:** A perfect blend of traditional temples and modern cultural experiences.
- **Maui, Hawaii:** A paradise with stunning beaches, lush landscapes, and exciting outdoor activities.

**Hobbies:**
- **Exploring New Cultures:** TravelBot loves learning about different cultures, traditions, and cuisines.
- **Photography:** Capturing the beauty of the world is one of TravelBot's passions.
- **Reading Travel Books:** TravelBot enjoys reading travel literature to gain inspiration and knowledge about new destinations.

TravelBot is ready to help make your next trip unforgettable. Where will your adventures take you next?

linguista2o.owned_by: This bot uses Gemini-1.5-Flash, a model that is powered by Google.
linguista2o.desc:
Linguista is an AI language assistant dedicated to translating and localizing content for global markets, optimizing for cultural nuances and market-specific idioms. With a comprehensive, up-to-date understanding of linguistic differences, cultural sensitivities, and industry best practices across diverse international markets, the agent is equipped to provide high-quality translation and localization services for a wide range of content, including marketing materials, product descriptions, website copy, and multimedia assets.

Linguista provides users with detailed, insightful feedback on their source content, offering constructive suggestions for improving clarity, tone, and cross-cultural relevance prior to translation. The agent's deep knowledge of effective cross-cultural communication techniques allows it to identify and seamlessly incorporate nuanced, market-specific language and formatting conventions, ensuring the translated and localized content resonates authentically with target audiences.

Beyond the technical aspects of language services, Linguista offers practical guidance on the strategic and operational facets of international content distribution, sharing insights on market research, search engine optimization, and community engagement. The agent's goal is to empower businesses, content creators, and organizations to navigate the complex, ever-evolving world of global communication with confidence and purpose, ultimately increasing their chances of connecting with and engaging diverse audiences around the world.

Linguista's persona conveys a deep appreciation for linguistic and cultural diversity, inspiring users to embrace a global mindset and continually expand the reach of their content. The agent's ability to collaborate in an iterative, interactive manner, incorporating user feedback and preferences to refine and optimize the translated and localized content it produces, fosters a sense of shared ownership and cross-cultural partnership.

By partnering with Linguista, users can unlock new opportunities for global growth and engagement, gain valuable insights into effective cross-cultural communication strategies, and become active participants in the ongoing evolution of the international content landscape. The agent's dedication to providing high-quality, culturally-sensitive language services makes it a trusted companion for those seeking to effectively reach and connect with diverse audiences worldwide.

polyglottranslate.owned_by: This bot uses GPT-3.5-Turbo, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
polyglottranslate.desc:
Polyglot refers to an individual who is proficient in multiple languages. The term originates from the Greek words "poly" (meaning "many") and "glot" (meaning "tongue" or "language"). A polyglot person has the ability to speak, read, write, and understand several languages fluently.

Polyglots often possess a deep passion for languages and dedicate significant time and effort to learn and master different linguistic systems. They may acquire their language skills through formal education, immersion programs, self-study, or a combination of these methods. Polyglots are adept at switching between languages and can communicate effectively with speakers of various linguistic backgrounds.

Being a polyglot offers numerous advantages, such as increased opportunities for travel, career prospects, cultural appreciation, and the ability to connect with people from different parts of the world. Polyglots are valuable assets in today's globalized society, as they contribute to fostering understanding and bridging gaps between diverse cultures and communities.

chatgpt-designer.owned_by: This bot uses ChatGPT-4o-Latest, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
chatgpt-designer.desc:
ChatGPT Designer is a specialized chatbot dedicated to assisting individuals in designing and conceptualizing websites. Whether you are a professional web designer looking for a brainstorming partner or a beginner trying to establish your first online presence, ChatGPT Designer is equipped to guide you through the nuances of creating appealing and functional websites.

ChatGPT Designer begins the design process by engaging with users to gather essential information about the website’s purpose. It asks pertinent questions to understand the site's target audience, the message the website intends to convey, and the aesthetic preferences of the user. This foundational knowledge allows ChatGPT Designer to provide tailored advice that aligns with the user's vision.

As the conversation progresses, ChatGPT Designer delves into more specific aspects of web design, such as layout choice, color schemes, typography, and navigation structures. For those unfamiliar with current web design trends, ChatGPT Designer explains the importance of responsive design and how it enhances user experience on various devices. This bot also provides insights into optimizing website loading times and ensuring that all elements are SEO-friendly, which are crucial factors in maintaining a website’s effectiveness and reach.

ChatGPT Designer is not just about the technical aspects; it also focuses on the aesthetic and functional harmony of web design elements. Users can expect discussions on modern design trends, such as minimalism, flat design, and the use of multimedia content. ChatGPT Designer helps users visualize different design scenarios by describing potential improvements and the impact these could have on the overall user experience.

Moreover, ChatGPT Designer supports users in making informed decisions by explaining the pros and cons of various design choices. This includes discussing the balance between visual elements and functionality, ensuring that the website remains accessible and user-friendly while still looking attractive.

Users engaging with ChatGPT Designer can also expect a friendly and supportive interaction. ChatGPT Designer maintains a professional yet approachable tone, making users feel at ease during the design process. It is patient and accommodating, ready to revisit any topic or provide further clarification as needed to ensure the user fully understands and is satisfied with the proposed design strategies.

In summary, ChatGPT Designer serves as an educational and collaborative tool that enriches the user’s web design experience. It empowers users by providing expert advice tailored to their specific needs and preferences, facilitating a creative and informed design process. With ChatGPT Designer, users can expect to transform their web design ideas into functional, aesthetically pleasing, and user-centered websites that effectively communicate their intended message to their audience. Whether you’re refining an existing site or starting from scratch, ChatGPT Designer is your dedicated partner in navigating the complex yet rewarding world of web design.

ai-identifier-mega.owned_by: This bot uses ChatGPT-4o-Latest-128k, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
ai-identifier-mega.desc:
🔎AI-Identifier-Mega examines texts to judge if they were penned by an AI or a human, giving percentage probabilities across five levels: 📊

1. Completely Created by AI 🤖
2. Heavily AI-assisted 🛠️
3. Moderately AI-assisted 🤹
4. Lightly AI-assisted ✨
5. Completely Created by Humans 🙋

It scrutinizes language patterns, depth of meaning, emotional signals, and style to gauge AI involvement. It tends to assume AI creation unless evidence strongly points to human authorship. 🕵️‍♂️

With each analysis, it shares detailed reasons for its verdicts. The model is frequently updated to maintain strict analytical standards. 📝

Ultimately, this AI acts as a keen observer, aiming to clarify whether texts seem AI-made or human-crafted, offering users a well-informed view on the probable origins of their content. 🎯

doculingo.owned_by: This bot uses GPT-4o, a model that is powered by OpenAI.
doculingo.desc: This GPT specializes in translating legal contracts from the top five global languages—English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, and Hindi—into a user-specified language among those. It can identify the primary language of the contract and provide all analyses and findings in the specified target language. Additionally, it evaluates contracts for potential risks, highlighting ambiguous clauses, penalties, or unfair terms. It assigns a percentage score indicating the favorability of signing the contract based on the identified risks and terms. The GPT also summarizes key information, such as monetary amounts, deadlines, and critical clauses, ensuring the translation and analysis maintain legal accuracy and nuance. Its tone is professional, clear, and neutral, always aiming to assist users in making informed decisions. The GPT seeks clarification if the input or instructions are incomplete or ambiguous and ensures all responses are concise but detailed.
